SELECT INQ_ID AS inqId, INQ_TITLE AS inqTitle, INQ_CONTENT AS inqContent, RESP_CONTENT AS respContent, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM INQUIRY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND ( INQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR INQ_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( INQ_ID, USER_ID, INQ_TITLE, INQ_TYPE, INQ_CONTENT, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( CONCAT('INQ_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '_', LPAD(FLOOR(RAND()*1000), 3, '0')), #{userId}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqType}, #{inqContent}, NOW() )
